      • VRDevice

        public VRDevice(java.lang.String serialNum,
                java.lang.String name,
                int tierIndex)
         throws BadDeviceInformationException
        Constructor method used to create a virtual reality device
        Parameters:
        serialNum - the serial number tied to this device
        name - represents the name of the device
        tierIndex - service level index for this particular device
        Throws:
        BadDeviceInformationException - exception thrown if the information for creating the device is incorrect
